content.rendered:
Looking to experience the beauty of Colorado from a different vantage point? How about from the air on a Hot Air Balloon Ride? We offer the highest altitude balloon rides in North America. Meeting in Breckenridge, CO and departing from the majestic South Park Valley, you will experience amazing views of the Collegiate Peaks. Thirty-six of Colorado’s fifty-six 14,000 foot peaks can be found in this area. Furthermore, we offer Hot Air Ballooning in Winter Park YEAR ROUND! Waking up early will be worth it as your balloon ride departs at sunrise. Watching the sun come up over this National Heritage Area, will truly be an experience you will never forget.

Don’t worry about going hungry during this experience because snacks and coffee await your arrival, and you can enjoy a small meal while your balloon is inflated. Once on the balloon, you will rise from treetop level to several thousand feet in the air. You will travel anywhere from two to ten miles. Enjoy classical music played by your pilot, during your one hour journey.

Once you are safely back on the ground, you will return to the launch site for a champagne toast, followed by a sit-down breakfast. Complete with a table covered in a white-linen table cloth, and an on-site chef preparing bacon, eggs, French toast, hash browns and fresh fruit and pastries.

The balloon Season lasts from May 25 through October and can accommodate up to 23 people at a time in South Park and year round in Winter Park. Come see what it feels like to fly!
